title: Naturalmente - temporarily closed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Organic, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, Portuguese
description: Naturalmente is a simple place to eat vegan and vegetarian food. Offers fresh fruit and vegetable juices, vegan cakes. Has a tea room. Self service for lunch. Restaurant closes with holidays - please let happycow know when it re-opens!
